column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Came here on a weekend trip to Chicago
column2: wanting to try some real Chicago deep dish pizza. I have to say it felt like your standard Italian chain restaurant (which I guess it is). Everything--food
column5: but nothing special. We tried the "Lou" pizza (spinach
column8: which was all right but a little bland. Same with the garlic bread we tried. Seems like a safe bet for a decent meal
column9: but next time I might venture out and try something a little more independent to get something more interesting.
